original_text: Thou shalt even take five shekels apiece by the poll, after the shekel of the sanctuary shalt thou take them: (the shekel is twenty gerahs:)
korean_text: 한 사람에 다섯 세겔씩 받되 성소의 세겔로 받으라 한 세겔은 이십 게라니라

sentences.original_text: Thou shalt even take five shekels apiece by the poll
sentences.korean_translation: 네는 각 사람의 머리 수대로 오 세겔씩 받을지니라

sentences.original_text: after the shekel of the sanctuary shalt thou take them
